NTR means, netorare, netori and netorarse. Or stolen, stealing, and sharing. The entirety of it is encompassed by the idea where there is desire for love, sex etc. But someone comes along and steals the person through sex therefore stealing the chance at that love being given. This is netorare, the kid had his mother's love taken from him through his "friends" dick.

This is an interesting story, isn't it? By technical definition (a woman who loves her husband/boyfriend is taken by someone else), this is NTR. However, Mami (the woman) and Satoru (the bullied son) were not wanted by Satoru's father. She barely felt much of anything for her husband, so when she was taken, it was certainly cheating, but was it NTR? Basically, is it stealing to pick up something thrown out? I reject the ongoing scope creep of NTR applying to mothers/sisters, so I won't talk about that. What's interesting is that Takeshi actually does make a significant effort on Satoru's behalf. Some of it is selfish, of course, since he wants Mami, but if that's all it was, why bother getting him a nice apartment cheap or jobs to make money, or any kind of help at all?

Well the art is certainly good but the story leaves a bitter taste in my mouth as this home wrecker ruins this kids life. Yes he is independent now but at the cost of his mom divorcing his dad and getting pregnant with his only friend, yea he’s gonna need therapy for years after this maybe even for the rest of his life. If there is a sequel it’s gonna be devastating for the kid. On page 47 you can really see the mind break tag in action and I’ve never seen mind break in one page so efficiently too. I feel like a younger me would be traumatized but this shit is actually rather plain by doujin standards and some would even say vanilla? But yea dark story, hot art and overall like a 6/10
Actually not bad its a netori and the friend helped him too so win win if anything he should be happy and the friend seem to love her too

He might react differently. He might feel betrayed, angry, resentful, even murderous. How would you feel if your mom was having sex with your 'best friend' behind your back and got her pregnant?

The guy's an asshole and rape is bad, y'all, but honestly he's otherwise been a net improvement to both of their lives. He got the mom out of her shitty marriage and helped build up the son's confidence while growing past his bullying. The author intended this to be NTR but it doesn't really come across that way in the end...

This wasn't so bad, if not for the author tried really hard to make it NTR as in the "NTR where the mother is separated from her child.", similar with Juna Juna Juice's doujin. Never really fond of such theme. I think Etuzan Jakusui's got a better version for this "my buddy is now my daddy".
